reviewText: hot hot hotter  BEAUTIFUL WOMEN CHARACTERS AND REALISTIC PASSION

If you are wondering what this is, go check out the reviews for volumes one and two of this series. If you already know what this is, then here's what you get in this third volume. The three episodes are Special Tastes: A TV reporter does a piece on the institute and ends up with more than just a story. On Means Of Exciting Desire: A man realizes that he is a character in a softcore movie, and just enjoys the ride. Carnal Heat: A detective is sent to the institute undercover to get evidence for a case against them, but ends up getting lessons that help spice up his marriage.

You get eleven sex scenes. Ten are boy/girl and one is girl/girl. The sex scenes are on par with what we were given in volumes 1 and 2. The women are all hot, with some A listers in the cast like Lisa Throw, Regina Russell, and Susan Featherly.

Audio and video quality are good, and Mainline is authoring the DVDs better. Each episode contains chapter stops within the episode now.

If you are new to the series, I'd recommend checking out volumes one and two first. I felt that they were slightly better than this one. But I still easily recommend this one.

This appears to be a rerelease of volume 2 of the "Secrets of the Kama Sutra" series. It sounds like it has the same content, so I can address that in this review.

This DVD contains three more episodes from the late night cable TV series. If you liked the three episodes from the first volume, then you'll like these as well. The stories are still not very interesting, but then not much time is wasted on them. This show knows what the viewer wants to see and gets right to it.

There are thirteen sex scenes. All are boy/girl, so I guess this would be good for couples. Most of the scenes were great. A few of them were a little short, but when the time between the long sex scenes is filled with short sex scenes, that's not something to really complain about. There are lots of beautiful women, some familiar (Tamara Landry, Gabriella Hall, Taimie Hannum) others new (Chloe Nicole, Tawny Garrison, Shyra Deland).

As I stated above, this is a rerelease, and a higher priced one at that. There may be some copies of the original release still available at the original, lower price.

However, even at the new price, I still recommend this one.
